message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider $10,000 as a final offer?
